thread.title: Exceeded My Expecations
thread.title_full: Exceeded My Expecations - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Manhattan/Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JEFF_K_1963
title: Exceeded My Expecations
text:
I travel to New York City on business at least twice a year. My company puts me up in different places each time I come, so I have had many good experiences as well as many bad experiences when it comes to hotel accomodations in New York City. This property exceeded my expectations and I will have my staff book me here from now on. The rooms were immaculate, very clean and very comfortable. It is in an excellent location, at least for me, it is. But the most impressive thing to me is the staff. Daniel at the front desk was amazing. He was very friendly, very welcoming, and extremely helpful. He is a true gem, but really, the entire staff here is terrific. There will be no more "trial and error" for me. From now on, I will insist that my staff only books me at this wonderful Fairfield Inn for all my future business trips to New York City.
